name: Tiles Apart
description:
Tiles Apart is a single player puzzle experience in which you can solve over 50 carefully crafted levels all while you are guided through intriguing environments. Slide rows of tiles to make your character traverse the many levels. The different tile types will have you thinking outside of the box in ways you cannot imagine...yet.

GOOD TO KNOW

In this game, you don't control the character; you control the tiles! Slide a row to the left and the character will move to the left. Slide a row to the right and the character will also move to the right. Use the different rows to your advantage and traverse mind-boggling puzzles.
This game is for real puzzlers, and is more than just mindlessly swiping!

Features

- 50 interesting and engaging levels
- Surreal art - Increasingly complex puzzles and systems - Atmospheric music and high-quality sounds
- No ads, in-app purchases, or download fee

🏆 BUAS/NHTV Best year 2 game overall 2017-2018 🏆 Information

- The game is in English only
- The game may contain bugs, send us an email if you experience one
